attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW so that anybody needing or demanding a language interpreter in official proceedings bears the cost.
attributes.additional_details: Whenever British citizens have official dealings in foreign lands and need language interpretation, they are required to pay for it.  It CANNOT be right that when foreigners need language interpretation services in this country, they can demand it knowing the British citizens will pick up the tab.  This situation MUST be balanced.  We pay in their country, they should pay in our country.
